postCreateCommand:
git clone https://github.com/ahmetb/kubectx.git ~/.kubectx && COMPDIR=$(pkg-config --variable=completionsdir bash-completion) && sudo ln -sf ~/.kubectx/completion/kubens.bash $COMPDIR/kubens && sudo ln -sf ~/.kubectx/completion/kubectx.bash $COMPDIR/kubectx && echo -e '

# kubectx and kubens
export PATH=~/.kubectx:\$PATH' >> ~/.bashrc
